attributes.action: Reject proposals to enforce manditory testing for scottish deer stalkers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the enforcement of manditory testing proposed in the envioment bill would be both unfair and racist against scottish stalkers we feel that the current legislation where voluntary testing or mentoring of newcomers to this activity is sufficient and has proved so over the years,manditory testing will force many recreational stalkers to give up this activity and will cause an explosion of deer numbers around certain areas that are currently being controlled by these recreational stalkers this will increase the risk of road accidents and fatalities involving deer in these areas.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
